website_summaries.verdict: Rustic accent tea light candle holder handmade in California.
pros: Unique pieces made with used oak wine barrels from Napa
Holds nine tea lights – some used it as a contemporary menorah
cons: At just 32-inches long, it’s not a large statement piece

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This wine barrel candle holder exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I loved the images of this wine barrel candle holder online but have to say that the actual product impressed us even more. You can really tell that these are unique and made from real pieces of an actual wine barrel so no 2 will be identical. Despite that quality, the price was also very reasonable making it a great value! Can't wait to decorate for Thanksgiving and Holiday season using our wine barrel candle holders.
customer_reviews.author: CGLoves

customer_reviews.title: Poor Craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: The quality was very poor. The wood was so rough to the point if not handled carefully would leave splinters in your hand. There were also white specks impeded in the surface. I immediately returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nouri

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: Candle holder arrived on time, had an attached card describing it's source and was exactly as advertised. The holder can use tea lights, votives and shot glasses. The underside/inside was stained burgundy from the wine. I bought it for a wedding gift. Very pleased with this unique item.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very Fine
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautifully crafted candle holder. It fit in perfectly on our large wooden dinning room set. The Lady of the house is very particular and has furnished our place like a show room. So it was with some trepidation I bought this for her for Valentines. She loved it. I was hero of the week...LOL I also bought the tea candles with 120 count. They are fine. John
customer_reviews.author: Jhceagle

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, not worth the money though.
customer_reviews.text: Overall finishing of the item was not great. Did not include any candles so you basically get a barrel stave with some drilling done to accommodate candles. Item was "ok", but overpriced in my opinion. I would have sent back but bought for Xmas exchange program and no time to return.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the wine business and love giving wine inspired gifts. This makes a gorgeous table or mantle centerpiece- the wood has a lustrous polish, and glows when lit. The underside is stained by the wine and it smells like a wine barrel, of course! The scent is just an added bonus. My friends have loved this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E. Guterbock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved wine barrel candle holder, perfect for the space on the mantle
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Piatkowski

customer_reviews.title: It's obvious that this is a great quality piece
customer_reviews.text: This was such a neat gift. I had bought one for my boss, and will be buying one for myself now after seeing the actual product! The smell of this piece was so rich and oaky, and the red staining on the bottom was such a neat visual. It's obvious that this is a great quality piece, straight from Napa! Loved it!! Perfect gift for any occasion!!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Martin

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: This candle holder is perfect! It looks so beautiful in every room - on the kitchen island, on the window sill in our dining room, on the soap stone stove in the living room (when stove is not in use, of course). Customer service is top notch! Five stars +.
customer_reviews.author: WandK, Union CT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand these reviews ! It is ugly and not worth 54 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and didn't think I would like it. I love it... very impressed with the quailty and may need to get myself one!
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to see underneath where the red wine saturated into ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Mother's Day gift for my Mom. It by far exceeded my expectations! Very elegant design. Beautiful to see underneath where the red wine saturated into the barrel.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ground element for your home
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks freaking amazing! I definitely recommend it. It's very sophisticated yet grounded at the same time.

customer_reviews.text: Got it as a 5th wedding anniversary gift and she LOVES it! High quality piece. Couldn't ask for better customer service from the Napa Gift Store. I'll be back.

customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted and it fits my style. I would definitely would recommend it. Very high quality. Even my son commented on it and how nice it was.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful addition to our home. We love it. High quality and it looks lovely on our mantel.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful - can't say enough. This was a gift for my sister's new apartment and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece of rustic home decor
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of rustic home decor! I actually searched for something like this on Amazon because I'd seen something like it - something MUCH smaller - on QVC for twice the price, plus hefty shipping costs! When this piece arrived, I was thrilled. It looks even better in person than in the pics. It is substantial and well crafted. I'd recommend it if you're looking for an awesome candle holder. I live at the beach, adjacent to wine country, and was looking for something special to put out for the fall and Christmas season. This absolutely fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Charla Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my parents for Christmas 2016. My husband and I loved it so much, we ordered one for our fireplace mantle. It's beautiful and we will order it again for our friends. Jeanette from Napa Gift Store reached out to me personally both times I ordered, and when I contacted her to thank her for her personal customer service. This has been my best Amazon purchase ever, and my husband and I order almost daily from Amazon. Excellent product, excellent quality, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: If they would just have taken two minutes to sand a little off each opposing corner so that it sat squarely on the ends I would
customer_reviews.text: It does not sit soundly. It is not stable and rocks from side to side. For a family owned business I would think they would take a little more pride in their craftsmanship. If they would just have taken two minutes to sand a little off each opposing corner so that it sat squarely on the ends I would have been delighted! To much trouble to return it so I'll sand the corners myself. Just saying, could have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Is S Ma

customer_reviews.title: Wheres The Shine And Finish?
customer_reviews.text: I wish the finish on my purchase was like the one pictured. I think they forgot to sand, stain, and seal this one. Kind of expensive for a rough piece of wood with some holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea that a barrel was used and recycled. However, for the quality of what I received (finishing not consistent on the piece), it was way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: MaineRocks!

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this tea light candle holder. I bought it as a gift for my daughters home for Valentine's Day but I love it so much I am ordering one for my son's apartment and my home as well!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. It's unique and well made. As soon as I saw it I wanted one too. She loved it as much as I did. Now I'm ordering one to use as a center piece on my dining room table, or I might use it on the mantle, or in the foyer... It looks great anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: ocmd

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on a dining table
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous wine barrel candle holder. I saw a product similar in Canada in a small wine town and couldn't buy it because I didn't want to deal with carrying it on an airplane so I found this product here. The product is well made and the wood is smooth. Looks great on a dining table.
customer_reviews.author: T. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Unique, Beautifully finished!
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this unique candle holder. I love it so much, I want to use it every night! I am using up all my candles - I think I will invest in the timed battery tea lights.😁
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful. I wish it stood up taller
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. I wish it stood up taller. It looks small on my fireplace mantle but would look great on a lower console table.

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea for repurposed wine barrels.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product that was promptly delivered, holds nine tea lights and helps set up a very cozy dinner table. Very satisfied with the quality and the utility of this product.

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than the photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a centerpiece for our table. The photos don’t so it justice. This is gorgeous.

customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's very simple and nice at the same time, make my kitchen table very cozy and romantic

customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a wedding gift and the bride to be loved it. Looks really cool.

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. It's on my fireplace right under my tv, it's not in the way. Looks great at night with tea lights.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Wood is unfinished with random black marks on it. Disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend and she loves it !! I got her some battery operated tea lights to go with it.

customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted. High quality. Unique. I bought it as a gift and like it so much that I would like to purchase one for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Candle Holder
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Very high quality and I love the fact that the underside shows the red color of the wine that came out of that barrel. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for wine enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved it! It was well made and packed well.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Elegance
customer_reviews.text: I received the wine barrel 9 candle holder. It truly exceeded my expectations. Simple elegance are the words to best describe your product.

product_meta.title: Napa Gift Store Wine Barrel 9 Candle Holder Made from Recycled Oak Wine Barrel Stave
product_meta.description: These beautiful hand crafted candle holders are made from oak wine barrel staves from Napa Valley in California. The stave is lightly sanded back to it's original wood showing the uniqueness of the grain and then sealed with three coats of clear coat lacquer to bring out the beauty of the oak. The underside is stained from the red wine previously held in the barrels. This 9 tea light holder has a beautiful arch that is not easily seen by these pictures.. This candle holder is a piece of history on it's own and adds a wonderful ambience to any setting.
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC WINE BARREL CANDLE HOLDER is a unique fantastic conversation piece and striking premium center piece made from used Napa Solid Oak Wood Barrels.

HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA, USA each stave is carefully separated from the barrel, and then meticulously sanded, stained and sealed in 3 stages to really bring out and protect the beauty of the oak, provide UV protection and create a really smooth furniture grade surface with a total of nine (9) holes made for a stunning display of tea lights.

UNIQUE PIECE OF NAPA HISTORY - Every rustic wine barrel tealight holder is one of a kind as the wine barrel stave comes from actual working wine barrels from Napa Valley in California and you will be able to see the red wine saturated into the underside of the stave.
DIMENSIONS: 24” High x 2.8”W x 2.5”H. Holds Nine (9) Tea Lights - Most Only Hold 5 Tea Lights!!!

ORDER NOW with our 100% SATISFACTION MONEY BACK GUARANTEE for yourself and your guest list. Your new wine barrel wall candle holder ships directly from Amazon and is safely packaged and guaranteed to arrive safely and on time.
